Dear ${contact_detail_spoc_payingcountry},

Please be aware that we have received notification of a cross border engagement between ${disclosing_country}/${disclosing_division} and the following CR:

  • CR NAME: ${name_of_cr}
  • Event Name: ${event_name}
  • Project Owner: ${project_owner}

Please find the link to the global Spend Upload Template for providing the payment details for this engagement. (general instructions for completion are also available at this location)

We kindly ask you to return the filled in Spend Upload Template to us by replying to this message no later than ${template_due_date_from_pe}.  

For this, please ensure that your local privacy laws and regulations allow the transfer of the filled in Spend Upload Template to us. If your submission has any issues, we will contact you again.

In case you have any questions, please refer to our Q&A or contact us by replying to this email.

Sincerely,
Your Global PLS Cross Border Team
